example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato una lavanderia vicino a casa.
example_sentence_english: I found a laundry near home.

example_sentence_italian: Lavanderie moderne offrono servizio a domicilio.

example_sentence_english: I am going to the laundry.
I go to the downtown laundries.
I come from the neighborhood laundries.

example_sentence_italian: Ho lasciato i vestiti nella lavanderia.
example_sentence_english: I left the clothes in the laundry.
They post advertisements in the laundries.
There is a review about the laundry.
I have information about the local laundries.
We collaborate with the local laundries.
